survey.name: Survey
survey.res: YOU CANNOT SELECT 'NONE' AND ALSO MAKE A SELECTION.
YOU MUST MAKE A SELECTION OR SELECT 'NONE'.
PLEASE BACK UP AND ENTER THE LETTER/NUMBER COMBINATION THAT YOU INTENDED TO ENTER.
THIS IS NOT THE CORRECT STIMULI. PLEASE SEE YOUR SUPERVISOR.
YOU MUST SELECT AT LEAST ONE PRODUCT FOR PURCHASE
PLEASE INFORM THE INTERVIEWER THE LETTERS YOU SELECTED ARE NOT CORRECT FOR THIS PHASE.
survey.html: This survey has already been completed.

samplesource.title: Open Survey
samplesource.invalid: You are missing information in the URL. Please verify the URL with the original invite.
samplesource.completed: It seems you have already entered this survey.

exit.span: THIS IS A TERMINATE! DO NOT BACK UP AND CONTINUE ANSWERING. ALERT YOUR SUPERVISOR IMMEDIATELY!

samplesource.exit: Thank you for taking our survey. Your efforts are greatly appreciated! THIS IS A COMPLETE.
Thank you for taking our survey. This is an over quota.

samplesource.title: Paradigm
samplesource.invalid: You are missing information in the URL. Please verify the URL with the original invite.
samplesource.completed: It seems you have already entered this survey.

block.label: Logistics

title.b: Set True or False based on Self Administered or Interviewer led. This drives text later. REMEMBER, no need to update text later as it should match exactly in word document.

radio.label: Location
radio.title: Please select your location:

text.label: LocationCode
text.title: This is used to assign each location's unique identifying code from the Location question row label. Do not edit.

block.note: Edit logic based on country - if one country, use "True", if multiple countries, assign based on sample company. Make sure field department knows to alert you if they are adding a sample company
block.html:
Hello, we are from a local a market research firm looking to conduct a survey. We are interested in your opinions.
If you qualify, we would like to ask you to participate in a survey at our facility. All market research projects comply with local and state health requirements. In states that have lifted mask requirements, the option to wear a mask remains a personal choice. COVID-19 policies can and will be amended from time to time based on changes to Local State and Federal health mandates.

checkbox.label: S_Recruit_Incentive
checkbox.title: INTERVIEWER: Indicate if the respondent is any of the following:
checkbox.row: Pre-recruit
Traditional Intercept
Raised Incentive Intercept
Raised Incentive MET

block.html: Good morning/afternoon/evening. I am ________ from Behaviorally, an international research organization. We are conducting research on various products and value your opinion. Could you spare some time to answer some questions?

radio.label: S_Gender
radio.title: Record gender by observation.

checkbox.label: S_PastParticipation
checkbox.title: Have you participated in a market research study within the past month, on any of the following topics?
checkbox.comment: Read list. Select all that apply.
checkbox.row: Laundry Detergent
Body Wash and Soap
Coffee and Tea
Hair Color
None of these

checkbox.label: S_Industry
checkbox.title: Does anyone in your household work for any of the following industries?
checkbox.comment: Read List. Select all that apply.
checkbox.row: Market research or marketing
Advertising agency or public relations firms
A graphic design or packaging firm
A company involved in the manufacturing, distribution or sale of laundry products
A company involved in the manufacturing, distribution or sale of coffee and tea products
A company involved in the manufacturing, distribution or sale of body wash and soap products
None of these

term.label: TERM_Industry
term.cond: (S_Industry.r1 or S_Industry.r2 or S_Industry.r3 or S_Industry.r6)

select.label: S_Shop
select.title: How much of the household’s body wash and soap shopping do you, yourself, do?

HAND RESPONDENT CARD SA.

number.label: Resp
number.title: Respondent ID

block.label: AgreementBlock
block.html: INTERVIEWER: At this point, hand the tablet over to the respondent. They MUST read the confidentiality agreement on the next screen and electronically sign, themselves, before being eligible to participate in the study.

title.p:
Respondent Confidentiality Disclosure Agreement (RCDA)
In exchange for receiving an incentive for participating in the Research (as defined below), which I hereby acknowledge, and understanding that I am otherwise under no other obligation to participate in this Research, I give my consent to Behaviorally, an independent market research company, and its affiliates and/or business partners to videotape, photograph, and/or record my participation in this consumer research and agree as follows:
title.ol:
Confidentiality: I agree to keep confidential and not disclose, copy, transmit, or use for any purpose other than your participation in this study any information or material disclosed or made available to you as part of the study, including about products or packaging that may be disclosed to you directly or indirectly by participating in this study. Any disclosure, copying, transmitting or misuse of any information or material in any form (including hard copy and/or electronic/data) whether intentional or unintentional may subject you to disqualification, and any other remedies available to Behaviorally or its study partners in law or equity.
Photo/Video Release & Use: I understand that as described above certain portions of the research may be audio and/or videotaped. Any recordings in which I appear and other information I provide (e.g., text, video, images or audio) (“Research Data”) may be used by Researcher for, trade presentations, product innovation, and internal training as determined by the Researcher, and I grant to Researcher and its affiliates permission to use that information in such ways.
Intellectual Property: I agree that the Research Data may or may not be used in whole or in part and I assign to Researcher and its affiliates all ideas, developments, discoveries, works of authorship, designs, software, and/or inventions, whether or not patentable, conceived by me as a result of my participation in the research, and understand that Researcher may use them in any manner it sees fit.
Data Privacy: I understand that my personal information, if any is collected, will be used for research purposes only or as otherwise described in this Informed Consent. Researcher is the controller of such data and will take all reasonable steps to ensure my personal data is protected. I will not be identified by name in any publication regarding the research. If I am a resident of the EU, I also have the right to access the personal data Researcher holds about me and, if such personal information is inaccurate or incomplete, to request the rectification, erasure or blocking of such personal data. I understand that I can exercise my data protection rights, which may include accessing, correcting, erasing, or holding processing of personal data, or withdrawing consent to use my personal data, by contacting info@behaviorally.com.
Contagious Disease: You agree that you will follow all appropriate protocols to ensure your safety. To that end, you agree to respect all the social distancing, face covering and other local and State safety, protective and reporting orders and rules in the areas and facility. You acknowledge that in consideration for Behaviorally's decision to permit you to engage in activities on behalf of the Company, you accept the inherent risk of exposure to communicable and contagious diseases such as COVID-19, and acknowledge anyone may carry and spread the virus whether symptomatic or not. By participating, you voluntarily assume the risk that you may be exposed to or infected by such virus or disease and release Behaviorally from all liability for any injury, illness, disability, death, damage, loss, or claim related to or arising out of the COVID-19 virus, provided that Behaviorally does not recklessly or knowingly expose you to the COVID-19 virus.
Limitation of Liability: RESEARCHER EXPRESSLY DISCLAIMS ALL WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND AS TO ANY PRODUCTS OR EQUIPMENT USED IN THIS RESEARCH, EXCEPT WHERE PROHIBITED BY LAW. IN NO EVENT WILL RESEARCHER BE LIABLE TO ME FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, SPECIAL, PUNITIVE, INCIDENTAL, EXEMPLARY OR CONSEQUENTIAL, DAMAGES, OR ANY DAMAGES WHATSOEVER, WHETHER IN AN ACTION UNDER CONTRACT, NEGLIGENCE, OR ANY OTHER THEORY, ARISING OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE RESEARCH.

comment.span: I have read the above, and I have had the opportunity to ask questions about this study and those have been answered to my satisfaction. I voluntarily agree to be a participant and I consent to Researcher processing my personal information in accordance with this document. I have received a copy of this consent and understand I can withdraw from the study at any time.

text.label: DateTime
text.title: DateTime
text.exec:
from datetime import datetime
cur_time = datetime.now() DateTime.val = cur_time.strftime("%m/%d/%Y %H:%M:%S")

text.label: RecruiterName
text.title: Recruiter: Please enter your name below.

block.html:
Close out the screener on your tablet and bring the respondent to the next station.
 
Use the respondent number below to re-open this link on other devices.
Respondent Number: [pipe: Resp]
If needed, tap here to start a new blank screener for a new respondent.

text.label: Resp_Info
text.title: INTERVIEWER: BE SURE TO FILL IN THE RESPONDENTS CONTACT INFORMATION. THIS INFORMATION WILL BE NEEDED TO COMPLETE THE VALIDATION SHEET

title.b: PLEASE RESCREEN USING THE FOLLOWING INFORMATION. IF THIS INFORMATION IS NOT CORRECT PLEASE SEE YOUR SUPERVISOR BEFORE CONTINUING.

Resp ID: [pipe: Resp]
Name: ${Resp_Info.Name}
Phase: [pipe: Phase]
Gender: [pipe: Gender]
Age: [pipe: Age]
Usage: [pipe: Usage]
BUMO: [pipe: BUMO]
Sample: [pipe: Sample]
title.b:
Phone Number: ${Resp_Info.Phone}
If you have tested the telephone number and successfully rescreened this respondent, please enter your initials:

survey.html:
Now bring the respondent to the next station.
 Use the respondent number below to re-open this link on other devices.
Respondent Number: [pipe: Resp]
If needed, tap here to bring up a new respondent for rescreening.

block.label: ET
block.builder:title: Eye Tracking
block.html:
ET Information
Your Respondent ID is: [pipe: Resp]
Your Sequence File name is: [pipe: JobNumber upper]Phase[pipe: Phase]Rot[pipe: Resp]

title.b: INTERVIEWER: PLEASE ENTER THE FOLLOWING INFORMATION:

survey.note: Only use this MET_Resp_Display block if there is MET

div.ul:
BRING RESPONDENT TO CALIBRATION AREA
COMPLETE THE MET CALIBRATION
ON THE NEXT SCREEN, HOLD THE TABLET UP TO THE RESPONDENT FOR 3 SEC. WHILE IT DISPLAYS THE RESPONDENT NUMBER

block.label: Shopping

text.label: Shopping_Interviewer
text.title: Shopping Interviewer: Please enter your name below.

block.label: RealEyeExercise
block.builder:title: Real Eye Exercise
block.html:
Hi! Your privacy and comfort are important to us!
You will be asked to turn on your webcam on the next page.
Your face and your background will not be recorded.
Just so you know - only the green dot area is being looked at for movement as you engage with our content.
[pipe:GREENDOTS]
block.note: Programmer NOTE: THIS RE_AreementBlock is for studies in Europe Only and is set FALSE for all other countries

block.label: RE_AgreementBlock
block.cond: Country.FR or Country.UK or Country.DE or Country.IT or Country.ES or Country.PL or Country.NL or Country.CH or Country.AT or Country.DK

div.ul:
At one point in the study, you will see images and we would like to use your computer’s webcam to provide data that will allow us to analyze the movement of your eyes and their movement relative to the images you are being shown.
Please know - We never store any images or videos from your webcam. By analyzing eye behavior, our client Behaviorally can understand more about how people react to various images.
These data points will be analyzed by computer, and final data output will be mixed with those of other people who take part in this study.
With your permission, researchers from Behaviorally may view the gaze prediction data to check everything is working correctly. The technology used is provided by our trusted partner RealEye. All data is processed and kept securely in accordance with the RealEye Privacy Policy (https://www.realeye.io/about/privacy/).

title.p: By consenting, you agree to share the data points reference above. This data will only be used for market research and analysis purposes associated with this Project and will not be shared in any public domain.

row.label: r1
row.b: Yes, I agree and consent to participate

row.label: r2
row.b: No, I do not agree, and I understand that the survey will end at this time

block.label: RealEyeSection
block.html: Redirect placeholder so that the redirect executes

autofill.label: EF_Status
autofill.title: Real Eye: Status
autofill.row: Skip (I don't want to participate in this test)

textarea.label: RE_Open
textarea.title: Please help us to understand why you decided to not take part in the webcam eye-tracking test.
textarea.comment: Please be as detailed and thorough as possible.

block.term: Real Eye: Skip/ Screen Out/ RealEye OQ

block.html:
INTERVIEWER: PREPARE TO SHOW SHELF/SHOPPING LIST ACCORDING TO PHASE AS INDICATED BELOW:
[pipe: Shelf]

INTERVIEWER: HAND RESPONDENT SHOPPING CARD IN SHEET PROTECTOR.
In a moment, I am going to show you a display of body wash that you might find in your local store. When I do, I’d like you to approach the display and shop for a body wash, as if you were actually in the store making your purchase.
Please be aware of the prices you see in this display, and the typical amount that you would spend on body wash during a single trip to the store. Please purchase no more than the quantity you typically purchase on a single shopping trip. You can feel free to take the product off of the shelf for inspection if you like.
When you see a product that you would like to purchase, please point to it, and let me know how many you would like to purchase.
INTERVIEWER NOTES: DO NOT READ UNLESS ASKED!
__________________________________________________________________
Assume this is a single trip to the store, keeping your budget in mind
You can purchase as many or as few items as you would like

number.label: O_PurchaseDuration
number.comment: Enter one digit in each box (including zeros).
number.validate: if this.c1.ival+this.c2.ival+this.c3.ival+this.c4.ival+this.c5.ival==0: error("CZAS ZAKUPÓW MUSI BYĆ WIĘKSZY NIŻ 0 SEKUND")

float.label: ShopTimeSeconds
float.title: Shopping Time (Seconds)
float.exec: ShopTimeSeconds.val = O_PurchaseDuration.c1.ival*60 + O_PurchaseDuration.c2.ival*10.0 + O_PurchaseDuration.c3.ival*1.0 + O_PurchaseDuration.c4.ival/10.0 + O_PurchaseDuration.c5.ival/100.0

checkbox.label: P_PickUpTotal
checkbox.title: Picked Up

checkbox.label: P_BackPanelTotal
checkbox.title: Back Panel

checkbox.label: P_Shopping
checkbox.title: Products Bought

number.label: P_Total_Products
number.title: Total Products Purchased
number.exec: P_Total_Products.val = sum([int(r.val) for r in P_QuantityPurchased.rows if r.val])

row.label: TB
row.autofill: P_Shopping.D1 or P_Shopping.D2 or P_Shopping.D3 or P_Shopping.D4 or P_Shopping.E1 or P_Shopping.E2 or P_Shopping.E3

row.label: r1
row.autofill: P_Shopping.B1 or P_Shopping.B2 or P_Shopping.B3 or P_Shopping.B4 or P_Shopping.C1 or P_Shopping.C2 or P_Shopping.C3

row.label: r1
row.autofill: P_Shopping.I1 or P_Shopping.I2 or P_Shopping.I3 or P_Shopping.J1 or P_Shopping.J2 or P_Shopping.J3 or P_Shopping.J4

radio.label: EaseofShopping1
radio.title:
HAND RESPONDENT CARD F2.
How easy or difficult do you think it was to shop the Palmolive products?
radio.row: Neither easy nor difficult to shop

radio.label: EaseofShopping2
radio.title:
HAND RESPONDENT CARD F2.
How easy or difficult do you think it was to shop these Isana products?
radio.row: Neither easy nor difficult to shop

radio.label: EaseofShopping3
radio.title:
HAND RESPONDENT CARD F2.
How easy or difficult do you think it was to shop these Nivea products?
radio.row: Neither easy nor difficult to shop

html.label: TURN_AWAY
html.strong: INTERVIEWER: ONCE SHOPPING IS COMPLETE, PLEASE TURN RESPONDENT AWAY FROM SHELF.

html.label: Finda_NoShelf
html.strong: INTERVIEWER: DO NOT RE-SHOW THE SHELF UNTIL INSTRUCTIONS HAVE BEEN READ AND RESPONDENT IS READY TO BEGIN!

text.label: FindTime
text.title:
INTERVIEWER: HAND RESPONDENT CARD [pipe: FindCard].
Now I am going to show you the display of body wash products again. This time, you will be looking for one particular item.
I am going to count down and then I would like you to turn around, walk up to the display, and find [pipe: Finda].
IF RESPONDENT UNDERSTANDS CONTINUE WITH THE STEPS BELOW:
INTERVIEWER: Ready? 3-2-1 GO
TAP "START" AS SHELF IS SHOWN
WHEN RESPONDENT FINDS THE SPECIFIC PRODUCT, TAP "STOP" AND CHECK WHICH PRODUCT THEY ARE POINTING TO
text.validate: if this.val == "": error("You must use the stopwatch to record the time.")

text.label: FindLetter
text.title: INTERVIEWER: ENTER THE LETTER AND NUMBER OF THE PRODUCT FOUND.

text.label: FindNumber
text.title: INTERVIEWER: ENTER THE LETTER AND NUMBER OF THE PRODUCT FOUND.

radio.label: FindProduct
radio.title: Product Found

radio.label: vFindCorrect
ConfirmFind
radio.title:
INTERVIEWER: YOU HAVE ENTERED THAT THE RESPONDENT LOCATED
[pipe: FindProduct]
IS THAT WHAT YOU INTENDED TO ENTER?

radio.label: F_EaseOfFind
radio.title:
HAND RESPONDENT CARD F3.
How easy or difficult do you think it was to find the product?
[pipe: SHELF_IMG]
radio.row: Neither easy nor difficult to find

radio.label: vEaseOfFind
radio.title: Ease of Find - filtered by correctly located - collapsed
radio.row: Neither easy nor difficult to find

float.label: vFindTimeSeconds
float.title: Time in seconds - Filtered by Correctly located - collapsed

radio.label: F_EaseOfFind_[loopvar: label]
radio.title:
(Filtered by Correctly located)
Using the statements on this card, how easy or difficult do you think it was to find the [loopvar: Finda] in this display?
radio.row: Neither easy nor difficult to find

html.label: Finda_RemoveShelf
html.strong: INTERVIEWER: REMOVE SHELF FROM VIEW/ESCORT RESPONDENT TO THE NEXT STATION.

strong.span: INTERVIEWER: HAVE THE RESPONDENT STAND AT 3 FOOT MARK IN FRONT OF THE SHELF AND FACING THE SHELF

radio.label: F_Layout
radio.title: Read list. Select a response for each statement.
radio.comment:
HAND RESPONDENT CARD FC. INTERVIEWER POINT TO THE COLGATE SECTION AND ASK:
I am going to read a list of phrases. Using the responses on this card, please tell me how much you agree or disagree that the phrase describes the Palmolive Body Wash section.
INTERVIEWER READ: This Palmolive Body Wash bottle shape..
radio.row: Is a premium looking body wash
Uses a minimal amount of plastic packaging
Looks different from other brands' bottles
Looks like it will be stable in my shower
Looks similar in size to the other brands' bodywash products

text.label: F_BrandImpression
text.title:
INTERVIEWER POINT TO THE PALMOLIVE SECTION AND ASK:
Looking at all of the products in this display, what three words best describe how the Palmolive body wash products make you feel? Any three words that come to mind.

radio.label: F_LineCommunication
radio.title: Read list. Select a response for each statement.
radio.comment:
RESPONDENT STILL HAS CARD FC.
Please continue to look at all the body wash displayed. I will read out a few more phrases. Using the responses on this card please tell me how much you agree or disagree that the phrase applies to Palmolive ONLY, based on all the packaging you see here.
INTERVIEWER READ: Palmolive Body Wash…
radio.row: Offers products that meet my needs
Offers a range of products for different needs
Is an environmentally friendly body wash brand
Is a good value for the money
I'd be proud to display this body wash in my bathroom

radio.label: Straightliner2
radio.title: DO NOT REMOVE OR MODIFY - Straightliner Punch - Just Tracking for F_LineCommunication

checkbox.label: F_Aesthetics
checkbox.title:
HAND RESPONDENT CARD FD.
Which of these choices best describe the appearance of this Palmolive Body Wash bottle shape?
checkbox.row: Boring
Distinctive
Out-of-date
Vibrant
Premium

block.label: Attitudinal

p.b: This section is self-administered and must be completed by the respondent.

block.html:
You are now going to see the picture of a pack. On that picture, you will be asked to highlight the areas you like most about the pack, if there are any.
Then on that same picture, you will be asked to highlight the areas you dislike about the pack, if any.

textarea.label: Q_Likes_[loopvar: label]
textarea.title: Using your mouse, please highlight the items/aspects of the packaging you like most (if any). If there's nothing that you specifically like, please click "I don’t like any of it" at the bottom of the page.
textarea.validate: if Q_Likes_[loopvar: label].c1.val != "" and Q_LikesNone_[loopvar: label].r1: error(res.MapError) if Q_Likes_[loopvar: label].c1.val == "" and not(Q_LikesNone_[loopvar: label].r1): error(res.MapError2)

checkbox.label: Q_LikesNone_[loopvar: label]
checkbox.validate: if Q_Likes_[loopvar: label].c1.val != "" and Q_LikesNone_[loopvar: label].r1: error(res.MapError) if Q_Likes_[loopvar: label].c1.val == "" and not(Q_LikesNone_[loopvar: label].r1): error(res.MapError2)
checkbox.row: I don’t like any of it

textarea.label: Q_Dislikes_[loopvar: label]
textarea.title: Using your mouse, please highlight the items/aspects of the packaging you like the least (if any). If there's nothing that you specifically like, please click "I don’t dislike any of it" at the bottom of the page.
textarea.validate: if Q_Dislikes_[loopvar: label].c1.val != "" and Q_DislikesNone_[loopvar: label].r1: error(res.MapError) if Q_Dislikes_[loopvar: label].c1.val == "" and not(Q_DislikesNone_[loopvar: label].r1): error(res.MapError2)

checkbox.label: Q_DislikesNone_[loopvar: label]
checkbox.validate: if Q_Dislikes_[loopvar: label].c1.val != "" and Q_DislikesNone_[loopvar: label].r1: error(res.MapError) if Q_Dislikes_[loopvar: label].c1.val == "" and not(Q_DislikesNone_[loopvar: label].r1): error(res.MapError2)
checkbox.row: I don’t dislike any of it

html.label: SelfAdmin_Flash_Complete
html.b: ALERT THE INTERVIEWER THAT YOU ARE DONE WITH THIS SECTION.

block.label: AttitudinalTest
block.builder:title: TestBrand Attitudinal
block.html:
For the next few questions, please focus your attention on each of the packaging you see here.
[pipe: LINE_IMG]

radio.label: Q_PI1
radio.title: How likely would you be to buy this Palmolive product, if they were available for the price you see below?

radio.label: Q_PI2
radio.title: How likely would you be to buy this Isana product, if they were available for the price you see below?

radio.label: Q_PI3
radio.title: How likely would you be to buy this Nivea product, if they were available for the price you see below?

radio.label: Q_OA1
radio.title: How much do you like or dislike the Palmolive bottle shape?

radio.label: Q_OA2
radio.title: How much do you like or dislike the Isana bottle shape?

radio.label: Q_OA3
radio.title: How much do you like or dislike the Nivea bottle shape?

textarea.label: Closing_OE1_[loopvar: label]
textarea.title:
How does the shape and grip of this bottle feel in your hand? and How does it impact your overall ease of use?
[loopvar: IMGLooprows]

textarea.label: Closing_OE2_[loopvar: label]
textarea.title:
What are your impressions of the bottle’s weight and quality?
[loopvar: IMGLooprows]

textarea.label: Closing_OE3_[loopvar: label]
textarea.title:
When the bottle is placed upside down, how stable does it appear to be, or would it be stable?
[loopvar: IMGLooprows]

p.b: Please inform the interviewer that you have completed this section.

html.label: Class_Intro
html.b: Now just a few questions for classification purposes...

radio.label: Household_Situation
radio.title: Which of the following best describes your current household situation?
radio.row: Single, living with roommates or family
Living with a partner, no children
Living with a partner and children

text.label: Household_Situation_OE
text.title: Please describe your current household situation below:

radio.label: ChildAge
radio.title: What are the ages of the children in your family?
radio.comment: Please provide the age of each child.

select.label: STANDARD_EDUCATION
select.title: What is the last level of education that you completed?

select.label: STANDARD_INCOME
select.title: What is your MONTHLY household income?

select.label: C_Employment
select.title: What is your current employment status?

p.b:
Thank you for your participation in completing this survey.
Please inform the interviewer that you have finished.

p.strong:
Thank respondent for his/her time and cooperation.
NOTE TO INTERVIEWER: Click the "Continue" button.

html.label: Final

strong.strong: PLEASE VERIFY THE FOLLOWING INFORMATION IS CORRECT. IF THIS INFORMATION IS NOT CORRECT PLEASE SEE YOUR SUPERVISOR BEFORE CLICKING "CONTINUE".

html.div:
Resp ID: [pipe: Resp]
Phase: [pipe: Phase]
Gender: [pipe: Gender]
Age: [pipe: Age]
Usage: [pipe: Usage]
BUMO: [pipe: BUMO]
Sample: [pipe: Sample]
